H0.text: What is the common name for the garden shrub pyracantha. Scarlet Hedge

H1.text: What is the common name for the garden shrub pyracantha. Thorny Bloom

H2.text: What is the common name for the garden shrub pyracantha. Red Tip

H3.text: What is the common name for the garden shrub pyracantha. FIRETHORN

A4.text: Pyracantha (from Greek pyr 'fire' and akanthos 'thorn', hence firethorn) is a genus of large, thorny evergreen shrubs in the family Rosaceae, with common names firethorn or pyracantha.
